Samuel S. Hinds https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Samuel_S._Hinds 0 Samuel Southey Hinds (April 4, 1875 – October 13, 1948) was an American actor and former lawyer. He was often cast as kindly authoritarian figures and appeared in over 200 films until his death. Samuel_Southey_Hinds ( April_4_,_1875 – October_13_,_1948 ) was an_American_actor and former_lawyer . He was_often_cast as kindly_authoritarian_figures and appeared in over_200_films until his_death .
